s.text: Compare these rates against your current provider and see what you could be saving, or at the very least verify that your current rate is competitive.
Compare these rates against your current provider and see what you could be saving, or at the very least verify that your current rate is competitive.
I'm not sure if you are aware of it or not, but many merchants are currently having their credit card processing rates increased significantly.
Date: Tue, 15 Feb 2011 03:34:08 -0500 From: "Credit Card Processing" <info@blindbt.info> Subject: Credit Card Processing Companies Compete for Your Business To: xxx@xxx.xxx
